attributes.action: call upon all members of parliament to recognise that through their abuse of the expenses system they have betrayed the trust of the British people and should stand down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are asking the Prime Minister to call upon all members of parliament to recognise that through their abuse of the expenses system they have betrayed the trust of the British people and as 'honourable gentlemen' they should do the honourable thing and stand down.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
